thread.title: POS Terminals Market in Brazil 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review
thread.title_full: POS Terminals Market in Brazil 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review

author: admin
title: POS Terminals Market in Brazil 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/19/2015 @ 2:47 PM Companies mentioned in this article: ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About POS terminalsPOS terminals are a combination of hardware and software that allows the users to accept card payments directly without updating their cash registers. The cost of installing a terminal varies with the size of business unit and selling terms with the channel partners and suppliers. POS terminal is an electronic device and performs the following functions:- Checks the funds status in a customer's bank account - Transfers the funds from customer's account to the seller's account - Records the transaction - Print the receipt of transactionTechnavio's analysts forecast the POS terminals market in Brazil to grow at a CAGR of 17.77% in terms of shipments during the period 2014-2019. Covered in this report This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global POS terminal market in Brazil for the period 2015-2019. It considers the revenue generated from the shipments of POS terminals in Brazil, including fixed POS terminals and wireless POS terminals. The report does not consider the revenue generated from the following:- Maintenance for POS terminals
